info.name: SempoBlockchain

item.name: Auth API
Admin Permissions

request.description: Sends an email invite to an admin user.

item.description: This API is used to manage platform Admin users permissions. Admin User objects and Invite Objects are merged on the frontend for a better UX.

request.description:
This is the register endpoint for both web and mobile.

For web, you must sign up using a unique email. The account must be activated by clicking the link sent.

response.name: 201 CREATED

request.description: This is the endpoint to activate a user account. Returns a login object

response.name: 201 CREATED
200 OK

request.description: Request a password reset to the given email address
External credentials endpoint for submitting data to the platform from KoboToolbox or other apps

item.description:
The AUTH API is primarily used for user login, logout, password actions. This is used for both Admin and standard platform users.

There is also a sub-folder "permissions" that is used for managing admin user tiers and platform admin invites.
